sentences.en: And other so - called alternative in fact, has a fatal defect insurmountable.
sentences.cn: 而其他 所谓 的替代方式其实都有不可克服的致命缺陷.

sentences.en: But the difficulties of sending goods out are not entirely insurmountable.
sentences.cn: 但是这种出口困难,不是完全不可克服的.

sentences.en: I say the railroading problem is insurmountable.
sentences.cn: 我说铁路运输问题是克服不了的.

sentences.en: No difficulty is insurmountable if one sets one's mind on it.
Now turned aside by an insurmountable precipice ; now starting back from a deep chasm.
sentences.cn: 时而因无法攀越的峭壁而转弯,时而因深陷的断层而返回.

sentences.en: She knew it was not insurmountable.
sentences.cn: 她知道这个问题不是不能解决的.
年龄障碍看来是无法逾越的.

sentences.en: The crisis doesn't seem like an insurmountable problem.
sentences.cn: 这次危机似乎并不难以克服。

sentences.en: The language difference proved an insurmountable barrier.
sentences.cn: 语言差异是难以克服的障碍。

sentences.en: There is no insurmountable difficulty before a brave man ; it is in difficult circumstances that a hero distinguishes himself.
sentences.cn: 好汉面前无困难, 困难当中出英雄.

sentences.en: This is understandable, but it may not be an insurmountable obstacle.
sentences.cn: 西欧的这种态度是可以理解的, 但这也许不是不可逾越的障碍.

sentences.en: Though this problem insurmountable, it can be solved.
sentences.cn: 虽然这个问题看似不可解决, 但事实上可以的.

sentences.en: Translation of terms presents an added problem but this is not insurmountable.
sentences.cn: 当然,凯利的理论中有一些术语还存在着翻译的问题,但这是可以解决的.

sentences.en: We know there are difficulties, But none of them are insurmountaBle.
sentences.cn: 我们知道有困难, 但这些困难都不是不可以克服的.

sentences.en: You will not further imagine it to be insurmountable.
sentences.cn: 你进而不会觉得那简直是无法解决的.

words.tran_cn: 不能克服的；不能超越的；难以对付的

trans.tran_cn: 不可逾越的，不能克服的
trans.tran_en: an insurmountable difficulty or problem is too large or difficult to deal with
